data.author: Oprah Winfrey
data.quote: What material success does is provide you with the ability to concentrate on other things that really matter. And that is being able to make a difference, not only in your own life, but in other people's lives.

data.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
data.quote: To love means loving the unlovable. To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable. Faith means believing the unbelievable. Hope means hoping when everything seems hopeless.

data.author: W. Edwards Deming
data.quote: We are here to make another world.

data.author: James Cameron
data.quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.

data.author: Cecil B. DeMille
data.quote: The person who makes a success of living is the one who sees his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly.

data.author: Paulo Coelho
data.quote: In the United States, I am a great success, but I am not a celebrity.

data.author: Jean Genet
data.quote: The fame of heroes owes little to the extent of their conquests and all to the success of the tributes paid to them.

data.author: Glenn Beck
data.quote: Without failure there is no sweetness in success. There's no understanding of it.

data.author: Theodore Roethke
data.quote: What we need is more people who specialize in the impossible.

data.author: Amos Bronson Alcott
data.quote: Our ideals are our better selves.

data.author: Mike Ditka
data.quote: Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.quote: If there is any one secret of success, it lies in the ability to get the other person's point of view and see things from that person's angle as well as from your own.

data.author: Arthur Balfour
data.quote: Enthusiasm moves the world.

data.author: Barbara Walters
data.quote: I found it interesting that as people become more technically oriented all over the world, at the same time people are becoming increasingly spiritual. The success of the Da Vinci code - even though it was a great yawn - also showed people's interest in religion.

data.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi
data.quote: Problems or successes, they all are the results of our own actions. Karma. The philosophy of action is that no one else is the giver of peace or happiness. One's own karma, one's own actions are responsible to come to bring either happiness or success or whatever.

data.author: Irving Berlin
data.quote: The toughest thing about success is that you've got to keep on being a success.

data.author: Ben Shapiro
data.quote: Socialism has no moral justification whatsoever; poor people are not morally superior to rich people, nor are they owed anything by rich people simply because of their lack of success. Charity is not a socialist concept - it is a religious one, an acknowledgment of God's sovereignty over property, a sovereignty the Left utterly rejects.

data.author: Joe Namath
data.quote: When you win, nothing hurts.

data.author: Jada Pinkett Smith
data.quote: I'm extremely ambitious. I don't know why people are afraid to say that. I won't sell my soul to the devil, but I do want success and I don't think that's bad.

data.author: Thomas Kincade
data.quote: I view art as an inspirational tool.
